thread.title: Who will invest in USA Pro Challenge?
thread.title_full: Who will invest in USA Pro Challenge?

title: Who will invest in USA Pro Challenge?
text: Who will invest in USA Pro Challenge? Stephen Meyers , stephenmeyers@coloradoan.com 11:41 p.m. MDT October 8, 2015 Roman Kreuziger celebrates winning stage 6 of the USA Pro Challenge Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015 in Fort Collins, CO. Erin Hull, Erin Hull Tayler Wiles celebrates winning stage 2 of the women's USA Pro Challenge Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015. Erin Hull, Erin Hull Kristin Armstrong celebrates her continuation as the lead rider in the women's USA Pro Challenge Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015 in Fort Collins, CO. Erin Hull, Erin Hull Stage 2 winner Tayler Wiles, left, hugs second place finisher Lauren Komanski at the USA Pro Challenge Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015 in Fort Collins, CO. Erin Hull, Erin Hull Fans strain to see the finish of the USA Pro Challenge Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015 in Fort Collins, CO. Erin Hull, Erin Hull The women take off from Loveland, CO in stage 2 of the USA Pro Challenge Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015. Erin Hull, Erin Hull Stage 6 winner Roman Kreuziger receives celebratory kisses at the USA Pro Challenge Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015 in Fort Collins, CO. Erin Hull, Erin Hull Lead rider Kristin Armstrong prepares to race in stage 2 of the USA Pro Challenge Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015. Erin Hull, Erin Hull Roman Kreuziger celebrates winning stage 6 of the USA Pro Challenge Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015. Erin Hull, Erin Hull Stage 2 winner Tayler Wiles reacts to winning a bike at the USA Pro Challenge Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015. Erin Hull, Erin Hull Challenge leader Rohan Dennis, left, and Kiel Reijnen get ready for the start of stage 6 at the USA Pro Challenge Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015. Erin Hull, Erin Hull Riders finish stage 6 of the USA Pro Challenge Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015 in Fort Collins, CO. Erin Hull, Erin Hull Rohan Dennis celebrates his continuation as the USA Pro Challenge leader Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015 in Fort Collins, CO. Erin Hull, Erin Hull Roman Kreuziger celebrates winning stage 6 of the USA Pro Challenge Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015. Erin Hull, Erin Hull A rider walks to the stage to sign in before taking off on stage 2 of the women's USA Pro Challenge Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015. Erin Hull, Erin Hull Riders take off from Loveland, CO for stage 6 of the USA Pro Challenge Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015. Erin Hull, Erin Hull Roman Kreuziger raises his arm in celebration as he crossed the finish line to win stage 6 of the USA Pro Challenge Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015, in Fort Collins, CO. Erin Hull, Erin Hull A rider takes a moment before the start of stage 2 of the USA Pro Challenge Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015. Erin Hull, Erin Hull A riders celebrates winning a jersey after stage 2 of the USA Pro Challenge Saturday, Aug. 22, 2015.
